typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Shop_Code as string,
		Shop_Name as string,
		TRANSDATE as string,
		TRANSTIME as string,
		TRANSNUM as string,
		SALE_TYPE as string,
		COMPANY as string,
		Compartment as string,
		SubCompartment as string,
		TYPE as string,
		nick_name as string,
		prod_code as string,
		Quantity as string,
		CST as string,
		Price as string,
		Unit_Price as string,
		CONCESSION_ID as string,
		CONCESSION_Code as string,
		CONCESSION_Description as string,
		Concession as string,
		Percent_Reduce as string,
		Price_Reduced as string,
		Amount as string,
		TAX_SLAB as string,
		TAXES1 as string,
		TAXES2 as string,
		emp_code as string,
		emp_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(COMPANY = COMPANY,
		Shop_Code = Shop_Code,
		Shop_Name = Shop_Name,
		Compartment = Compartment,
		SubCompartment = SubCompartment,
		TYPE = TYPE,
		nick_name = nick_name,
		prod_code = prod_code,
		quantity = Quantity,
		CST = CST,
		Price = Price,
		Unit_Price = Unit_Price,
		CONCESSION_ID = CONCESSION_ID,
		CONCESSION_Code = CONCESSION_Code,
		Price_Reduced = Price_Reduced,
		CONCESSION_Description = CONCESSION_Description,
		Concession = Concession,
		Percent_Reduce = Percent_Reduce,
		Amount = Amount,
		TAX_SLAB = TAX_SLAB,
		TAXES1 = TAXES1,
		TAXES2 = TAXES2,
		emp_code = emp_code,
		Emp_Name = emp_Name,
		TRANSDATE = TRANSDATE,
		TRANSTIME = TRANSTIME,
		TRANSNUM = TRANSNUM) ~> SetAttributes
SetAttributes sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		json_value as string
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Shop_Name = COMPANY,
		{} = Shop_Code,
		Shop_Name,
		Compartment,
		SubCompartment,
		TYPE,
		nick_name,
		prod_code,
		Quantity = quantity,
		CST,
		Price,
		Unit_Price,
		CONCESSION_ID,
		CONCESSION_Code,
		Price_Reduced,
		CONCESSION_Description,
		Concession,
		Percent_Reduce,
		TAX_SLAB,
		TAXES1,
		TAXES2,
		emp_code,
		emp_Name = SetAttributes@Emp_Name,
		TRANSDATE,
		TRANSTIME,
		TRANSNUM
	)) ~> sink1
